definition: commonly used or supplied, any distinctive flag
details:
adjective
- commonly used or supplied
= example: commonly used or supplied
- regularly and widely used or sold
= example: regularly and widely used or sold
= synonyms: stock
- established or well-known or widely recognized as a model of authority or excellence
= example: established or well-known or widely recognized as a model of authority or excellence
- conforming to or constituting a standard of measurement or value
- conforming to the established language usage of educated native speakers
= example: conforming to the established language usage of educated native speakers
= synonyms: received
noun
- any distinctive flag
= synonyms: banner
- an upright pole or beam (especially one used as a support)
= example: an upright pole or beam (especially one used as a support)
- the ideal in terms of which something can be judged
= example: the ideal in terms of which something can be judged
= synonyms: criterion
- a basis for comparison
= synonyms: measure
- the value behind the money in a monetary system
= synonyms: monetary standard
- a board measure = 1980 board feet
